step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them down.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Second set starting strong! Ensure your shoulders are moving in a smooth circle.
Excellent control! Try to keep your elbows slightly bent throughout the motion.
Fantastic finish! You're doing a great job improving your shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to inhale deeply when rolling back to help with breathing and oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work!
